menu.returnToMenu: Wrap it up and glide back to the title
menu.disconnect: Wrap it up and glide back to the title
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.root.desc: What else can you discover while fixing someone else‚Äôs holiday?
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.hypercarr: Bring 20 gifts into the centerpiece tree yourself in a single game
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.jarless_w: It‚Äôs how it should‚Äôve been done
Winning without getting jarred by the kid
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.jarred_fr: Don‚Äôt get too comfortable in there
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.riskrunne: Bring 3 or more gifts and claim them without getting caught
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.winning.t: It ain‚Äôt much but it‚Äôs honest work
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.powerup.t: This is useful. Are there more than this?
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.powerup.d: Claiming one or more special-puzzle powerup, You can obtain a cool hat cosmetic!
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.dash.desc: Obtain a dash powerup, You will obtain a cool hat cosmetic!
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.hidden.ti: Time to go full sneak mode!
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.hidden.de: Obtain a hiding powerup, You will obtain a cool hat cosmetic!
srn.advancements.elf_discovery.wisdom.de: Obtain a wisdom powerup, You will obtain a cool hat cosmetic!
srn.advancements.grinch_discovery.root.t: What are you doing in the middle of the night?
srn.advancements.grinch_discovery.root.d: Sometimes, human can be curious too
srn.advancements.grinch_discovery.winnin: These elves will be one of my best pets!
srn.advancements.grinch_discovery.disesc: Capture an elf at least 5 seconds after they are freed from a jar
srn.advancements.grinch_discovery.jarrin: Capture an elf with one or more powerup(s)
srn.global.announce.newcomer_elf: Here goes another newcomer elf, Welcome %s!
srn.play.announce.elf_begone: No elves are around.. Ending game in 10 seconds..
srn.play.announce.elf_exchanged_gift: %s has placed a gift into the centerpiece tree!
srn.play.announce.winner: %s is the winner of this game!
srn.tip.generic.hover_run_command: Click and send to run this action!
srn.tip.elf.0: There are probably more secrets to be uncovered in this house! Never be afraid to interact with interesting trinkets
srn.tip.elf.1: Write %s in the chat to show the list of controls
srn.tip.elf.2: Do not fear the dark, there is nothing that lurks in there, you got this
srn.tip.elf.3: Watch out for any tricks & traps that the kid can use against you
srn.tip.elf.4: Cardboard boxes are solid, an elf can stand on them and can also pick them up!
srn.tip.elf.5: Some places can teleport you to another, they might help save your life
srn.tip.elf.6: In this house, the more you know, the more you can do. Knowledge is power!
srn.tip.elf.7: Watch your head! Gifts can fall off when you went through short passages
srn.tip.elf.8: Take a look at your achievements by pressing [%s]
srn.tip.elf.9: You can lose all of your gifts, either by being catched or teleporting
srn.tip.elf_lobby.0: Write %s in the chat to show off your amazing-powerup-hat cosmetics in lobby! If you have one..
srn.tip.elf_lobby.1: Write %s in the chat, at the lobby, to teleport to lobby
srn.tip.grinch.0: Hold %s + %s to Crawl, Release to Uncrawl
srn.tip.grinch.1: Write %s in the chat to show the list of controls
srn.tip.grinch.2: Sharpen your hearing, foolish elves rarely watch their step!
srn.tip.grinch.3: Use your powerups sparingly, else they clutter the whole house..
srn.tip.grinch.4: You can pickup any cardboard box using [%s]
srn.tip.grinch.5: Take a look at your achievements by pressing [%s]
srn.tip.grinch.6: If a mouse trap catches something, you‚Äôll have to unwind it. Unwind an unwinded mouse trap by [%s] at it
srn.tip.grinch.7: Mouse traps can instantly break a jar, so place them wisely!
srn.settings_set.0: Game duration are now set to: %s Minutes
srn.settings_set.1_true: In-game helpful tips are set to Shown
srn.settings_set.1_false: In-game helpful tips are set to Not Shown

srn.settings_set.2_false: Friendly Nametag are set to Not Shown
srn.actionbar.elf.hat: Walk to the place where it belongs without seeing & jumping, [%s] to dismount
srn.actionbar.elf.wisdom: You gained precious Insights! Note down the location of gift(s) you see, [%s] to exit state
srn.actionbar.elf.picking_collectible: Hold [%s] charge the throw, [%s] throw collectible
srn.actionbar.elf.jarred: Oh no! Find a way to break free before it‚Äôs too late
srn.actionbar.elf.about_to_sneeze: Don‚Äôt stay at the same place! You can sneeze!
srn.actionbar.grinch.picking_pickable: Hold [%s] to reach further, [%s] put down object
srn.actionbar.grinch.select_powerup: [%s] to Use / Place selected powerup, [%s] to Drop them
srn.help.elf.2: ‚Ä¢ To %s ‚û° Hold [%s], press [%s] to throw and spend the charge buildup
srn.help.elf.hidden: ‚Ä¢ To %s ‚û° Hold [%s], release to exit hidden state
srn.help.elf.wisdom: ‚Ä¢ To %s ‚û° Hold [%s] for 2 seconds, press [%s] to exit
srn.help.jar: ‚Ä¢ Since you are jarred now, you can either: 1. ask for help or 2. break free yourself
srn.toggle_powerup_cosmetic.elf_true: Displayed hat cosmetics of powerups you‚Äôve gathered during previous games
srn.trigger.fail: Can‚Äôt trigger that action right now..
srn.notif.elf.start_spectate: Since you didn‚Äôt pick a team, you spawned as a %s of this game
srn.notif.elf.wisdom_invalidstate: Can‚Äôt activate wisdom ability in this state
srn.notif.elf.wisdom_existing: Someone else is using the same ability, try again later..
srn.notif.grinch.how_to_lock: Open a door and use this padlock to lock that door!
srn.credits.dialog.title: ÔÄÇ
srn.lobby_text.requirement_text_0.line_2: ‚ùó The game is meant to be played with more %1$s than %2$s ‚ùó

srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.title: Playing as a %1$s
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.line_0.se: ‚òÖ  Your %1$s is to %2$s %3$s & put them in jars
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.line_1.pa: any place where they can't fall and shatter
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.line_2.se: ‚ùó  Find %1$s around the house, use it to easily %2$s %3$s
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.line_3.se: ‚Ñπ  You can %1$s to reach lower parts easily, to crawl, hold [%2$s] + [%3$s]
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_grinch.line_4.se: ‚Ñπ  You can %1$s to create %2$s, which can limit %3$s's mobility
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_elf.title: Playing as a %1$s
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_elf.line_0.parti: place them under the Centerpiece Trees
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_elf.line_1.sente: ‚ùó  Be careful with %1$s or %2$s That's how the %3$s wins!
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_elf.line_3.sente: ‚Ñπ  Check your %1$s! It's full of hints to secret powerups!
srn.lobby_text.tutorial_elf.line_4.sente: ‚Ñπ  You can %1$s to create %2$s & help you go to %3$s
srn.sounds.elf.jarred: Someone being put inside a jar
srn.sounds.grinch.bangs_locked_door: Someone bangs a door really loudly
srn.sounds.entity.musicbox_fail: Music box rangs at something wrong
srn.dialog.elf.game_start.2: ..Then put all of them under the centerpiece tree
srn.dialog.elf.game_start.3: %s Gifts in total.. Collect them all before sunrise
srn.dialog.elf.game_start.4: Huh? sounds like someone in this house is awake!
srn.dialog.elf.almost_timeout.0: Drat! Seems like the sun is about to rise!
srn.dialog.elf.dash.1: By pressing [%s], I will dash and run much quicker for a while
srn.dialog.elf.diningroom_puzzle_activat: Let‚Äôs place them somewhere they are supposed to..
srn.dialog.elf.diningroom_puzzle_deactiv: Fortunately I don‚Äôt have to redo the whole thing again
srn.dialog.elf.hidden.2: By pressing [%s], I can hide and sneak past anyone!
srn.dialog.elf.in_hat.1: But i can‚Äôt see anything here..
srn.dialog.elf.in_hat.2: This thing is really out of place being here..
srn.dialog.elf.in_hat.4: I better be careful on my way there.. Even when someone catches me, I can still run away
srn.dialog.elf.jarred.1: My gifts are all gone, I‚Äôm in so much trouble!
srn.dialog.elf.livingroom_puzzle_activat: Let‚Äôs see what happened when I light up this entire room with this..
srn.dialog.elf.livingroom_puzzle_deactiv: Ah seems like i can‚Äôt touch the floor..
I‚Äôll have to make sure to light up in the right order too!
srn.dialog.elf.masterbedroom_puzzle.2: Oh, I start to see patterns!
srn.dialog.elf.masterbedroom_puzzle.3: ..Let‚Äôs interact them according to that pattern..
srn.dialog.elf.pre_sneeze.0: Huh.. this house is so dusty!
srn.dialog.elf.pre_sneeze.1: I need to keep running! Hmp...
srn.dialog.elf.scared.2: Ugh, my ear is ringing from that.. Noise alone..
srn.dialog.elf.sneezed.2: ..Uh oh, no one heard that, right?
srn.dialog.elf.strength.2: Human food is something I can‚Äôt get enough with..
srn.dialog.elf.wisdom.0: Hm what a cool Looking thing..
srn.dialog.elf.wisdom.1: Ah.. Whoah.. i can see even better now!
srn.dialog.elf.wisdom.2: By holding [%s], I can take a peek at any gift in any room..
srn.dialog.elf.wisdom.4: I need to note the location as well..
srn.dialog.elf.wisdom.5: ..But I can‚Äôt spend too much time ‚Äùseeing‚Äù, else someone can catch me off guard
srn.dialog.elf.teleport.fail_held: I can‚Äôt teleport when bringing something with me
srn.dialog.elf.held_limit.1: The weight is too much to bear right now..
srn.dialog.grinch.game_started.0: I gotta be careful, mom and dad is still in their deep slumber. Let‚Äôs not jump around too much until sunrise..
srn.dialog.grinch.game_started.1: Ah, just in case, let me also bring my trusty jar!
srn.dialog.grinch.jarred.0: Whoah, what a cool looking creature!
srn.dialog.grinch.jarred.2: Lets see if there are more like you in this house...
srn.dialog.grinch.tantrum.0: Ah! I‚Äôm not going to let them win!
srn.dialog.grinch.tantrum.1: And i really wanted even more pets at this point..
srn.dialog.grinch.use_cracker.1: Lets see if there is anyone in this room is surprised by it..
